Package uk.mqchinee.archelia.gui

Class ChestMenu

java.lang.Object
uk.mqchinee.archelia.gui.ChestMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
PageableChestMenu
public class ChestMenu extends Object
The core class for creating and managing GUI menus in Bukkit/Spigot.

This class provides methods to add, remove, and update menu items, as well as handle events related to the GUI menu. It represents a GUI menu that can be displayed to players and interacted with through inventory click events.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public ChestMenu addItem(MenuItem item, int slot)
      Adds a MenuItem to the specified slot in the ChestMenu.
      Parameters:
      item - The MenuItem to add.
      slot - The slot number (0-based) where the MenuItem will be placed.
      Returns:
      The updated ChestMenu.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the slot is less than zero or greater than or equal to the inventory size.

    • removeItem

      public ChestMenu removeItem(int slot)
      Removes the MenuItem from the specified slot in the ChestMenu.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot number (0-based) from which the MenuItem will be removed.
      Returns:
      The updated ChestMenu.

    • setItem

      public ChestMenu setItem(MenuItem item, int slot)
      Sets the MenuItem for the specified slot in the ChestMenu. If there was already a MenuItem in that slot, it will be replaced.
      Parameters:
      item - The MenuItem to set.
      slot - The slot number (0-based) where the MenuItem will be placed.
      Returns:
      The updated ChestMenu.

    • fill

      public void fill(int from, int till, LoopableItem item)
      Fills the specified range of slots with the given LoopableItem.
      Parameters:
      from - The start slot number (0-based) of the range to fill.
      till - The end slot number (0-based) of the range to fill.
      item - The LoopableItem to fill the range with.

    • fill

      public void fill(int from, int till, ClickableItem item)
      Fills the specified range of slots with the given ClickableItem.
      Parameters:
      from - The start slot number (0-based) of the range to fill.
      till - The end slot number (0-based) of the range to fill.
      item - The ClickableItem to fill the range with.

    • getItem

      public MenuItem getItem(Integer slot)
      Retrieves the MenuItem at the specified slot in the ChestMenu.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot number (0-based) to retrieve the MenuItem from.
      Returns:
      The MenuItem at the specified slot, or null if there is no item at that slot.

    • getItems

      public Map<Integer,MenuItem> getItems()
      Retrieves all the items in the ChestMenu as an unmodifiable map of slot to MenuItem.
      Returns:
      A map of slot numbers (0-based) to their respective MenuItems.

    • getItemStack

      public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getItemStack(Integer slot)
      Retrieves the ItemStack at the specified slot in the ChestMenu.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot number (0-based) to retrieve the ItemStack from.
      Returns:
      The ItemStack at the specified slot, or ItemStack(Material.AIR) if there is no item at that slot.

    • getItemStacks

      public Map<Integer,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getItemStacks()
      Retrieves all the non-empty ItemStacks in the ChestMenu as an unmodifiable map of slot to ItemStack.
      Returns:
      A map of slot numbers (0-based) to their respective non-empty ItemStacks.

    • containsItem

      public boolean containsItem(Integer slot)
      Checks if the specified slot in the ChestMenu contains a MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot number (0-based) to check.
      Returns:
      true if the slot contains a MenuItem, false otherwise.

    • setItems

      public ChestMenu setItems(Map<Integer,MenuItem> items)
      Sets the items in the ChestMenu to the specified map of slot to MenuItem. Existing items in the ChestMenu will be replaced.
      Parameters:
      items - The map of slot numbers (0-based) to their respective MenuItems.
      Returns:
      The updated ChestMenu.

    • clearItems

      public ChestMenu clearItems()
      Clears all items in the ChestMenu.
      Returns:
      The updated ChestMenu.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the entire ChestMenu by updating all the item stacks.

    • update

      public void update(int slot)
      Updates the item stack at the specified slot in the ChestMenu.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot number (0-based) to update.

    • requireUpdate

      public void requireUpdate(Integer slot)
      Marks the specified slot in the ChestMenu as requiring an update.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot number (0-based) that requires an update.

    • open

      public void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Opens the ChestMenu for the specified player. If the inventory has viewers, it will be closed and reopened for the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to open the ChestMenu for.

    • hasViewers

      public boolean hasViewers()
      Checks if the ChestMenu has any viewers.
      Returns:
      true if the ChestMenu has any viewers, false otherwise.

    • copy

      public ChestMenu copy()
      Creates a copy of the ChestMenu with all the same properties and items.
      Returns:
      A new copy of the ChestMenu.

    • handlesUpdateItemsTask

      protected void handlesUpdateItemsTask()
      Handles the update items task for the ChestMenu.

    • handleUpdateItems

      protected void handleUpdateItems()
      Updates the items in the ChestMenu that require updates.
